TextEng: "Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"I need to return home to the world of Toril."
"Why won't she let you see him?"
Text: "왜 그녀가 너희를 그분을 만나게 해주지 않는 거야?"

TextEng: "What mess did the sensei get you into?"
"Why, what issue did you have with him?"
"What issue did he have with the sensei?"
"What mess did the sensei get you into?"
"That winged chap in the tavern... You know him?"
"How did he plan to wake the Sleeping Man?"
"I seek answers to the Five-Fold Mysteries."
